title: क्या बंगाल में भगवा झंडा लहराने के कारण इस लड़के के साथ इतना अमानवीय व्यवहार किया गया?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Deoria: Miscreants tied youth to a tree & thrashed him after he asked them for the money lent by him. Video of the incident went viral, Police took cognizance & arrested one accused, say, 'Main accused arrested, 4 others in video have been identified & are absconding.'(28.3) pic.twitter.com/1IjLIm4rtw
